title: (OST) Grease - VA 320CBR
description:
The most successful songs "Grease" (#1), "You The One That I Want(#1), "Hopelessly Devoted To You (#3) were written especially for the movie. Another track "Summer Nights" (in the musical as well as the film) hit the Top 5 on the American charts.

Track Listing:

Disc 1

01 - Grease - Frankie Vallie	
02 - Summer Nights - Olivia Newton-John, John Travolta & Cast
03 - Hopelessly Devoted To You - Olivia Newton-John
04 - You're The One That I Want - Olivia Newton-John & John Travolta
05 - Sandy - John Travolota
06 - Beauty School Drop-Out - Frankie Avalon
07 - Look At Me, I'm Sandra Dee - Stockard Channing, Didi Conn, Dinah Manoff & Jamie Donnelly
08 - Greased Lightnin'- John Travolta
09 - It's Raining On Prom Night - Cindy Bullens
10 - Alone At The Drive-In - Instrumental
11 - Blue Moon - Sha-Na-Na
12 - Rock N' Roll Is Here To Stay - Sha-Na-Na
13 - Those Magic Changes - Sha-Na-Na
14 - Hound Dog - Sha-Na-Na
15 - Born To Hand Jive - Sha-Na-Na
16 - Tears On My Pillow - Sha-Na-Na
17 - Mooning - Louis St. Louis and Cindy Bullens
18 - Freddy My Love - Cindy Bullens
19 - Rock N' Roll Party Queen - Louis St. Louis
20 - There Are Worse Things I Could Do - Stockard Channing
21 - Look At Me, I'm Sandra Dee (Reprise) - Olivia Newton-John
22 - We Go Together - Olivia Newton-John, John Travolta & Cast
23 - Love Is Many Splendored Thing - Instrumental
24 - Grease (Reprise) - Frankie Vallie
